sQuestion: Joan has 47 green and 48 red marbles . Fred took 24 of Joan 's green marbles . How many green marbles does Joan now have ?

There are 42 walnut trees and 12 orange trees currently in the park . Park workers had to cut down 13 walnut trees that were damaged . How many walnut trees will be in the park when the workers are finished ?
Sandy had 36 pennies and 31 nickels in her bank . Her dad borrowed 20 nickels from Sandy . How many nickels does she have now ?
There are 34 pencils and 49 crayons in the drawer . Dan took 22 pencils from the drawer . How many pencils are now in the drawer ?
Sally paid $ 12.32 total for peaches , after a 3 dollar coupon , and $ 11.54 for cherries . In total , how much money did Sally spend ?
Dan spent $ 11.76 on a snake toy , and a cage cost him $ 14.54 . Dan also found a dollar bill on the ground . What was the total cost of Dan 's purchases ?
Mary went to the mall . She spent $ 13.04 on a shirt and $ 12.27 on a jacket . She went to 2 shops . In total , how much money did Mary spend on clothing ?
Dan joined his school 's band . He bought a clarinet for $ 130.30 , and a song book which was $ 11.24 . Dan found $ 12.32 in his pocket . How much did Dan spend at the music store ?
Tom bought a skateboard for $ 9.46 , and spent $ 9.56 on marbles . Tom also spent $ 14.50 on shorts . In total , how much did Tom spend on toys ?
Mary got fast food for lunch . Mary spent $ 1.08 on soup and $ 4.80 on a salad . Mary paid with a 20 dollar bill . What was the total of the lunch bill ?
